spell.asterismarcanum.starfire.guide: Bring forth a minor piece of the heavens themselves, and launch it towards where you are looking.
spell.asterismarcanum.moonbeamed.guide: Disappear in a flash of light, and appear at the location in which you are looking.
spell.asterismarcanum.nebulous_cone.guid: Send out a cone of nebulous magic, and deal damage to entities caught within.
